gems.name: freshchat_whatsapp
gems.info: The Ruby gem support for Freshchat WhatsApp integration enables seamless communication by leveraging the power of Freshchat within Ruby applications. It allows developers to integrate WhatsApp messaging functionalities into their Ruby-based projects using Freshchat's comprehensive features. This integration simplifies the process of incorporating WhatsApp as a communication channel, offering a convenient solution for Ruby developers to enhance customer
